trans-unit.source: Please note that CTest has no concept of what a GPU is or how much memory it has, nor does it have any way of communicating with a GPU to retrieve this information or perform any memory management. CTest simply keeps track of a list of abstract resource types, each of which has a certain number of slots available for tests to use. Each test specifies the number of slots that it requires from a certain resource, and CTest then schedules them in a way that prevents the total number of slots in use from exceeding the listed capacity. When a test is executed, and slots from a resource are allocated to that test, tests may assume that they have exclusive use of those slots for the duration of the test’s process.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，CTest没有概念是什么GPU或它有多少内存，也没有任何与GPU进行通信以检索此信息或执行任何内存管理的方式。 CTest只是跟踪抽象资源类型的列表，每个抽象资源类型都有一定数量的插槽供测试使用。每个测试都指定它从某种资源中需要的插槽数，然后CTest以一种防止使用中的插槽总数超过列出的容量的方式对其进行调度。当执行测试并将资源中的插槽分配给该测试时，测试可以假定它们在测试过程的持续时间内独家使用那些插槽。

trans-unit.source: Policies in CMake are used to preserve backward compatible behavior across multiple releases. When a new policy is introduced, newer CMake versions will begin to warn about the backward compatible behavior. It is possible to disable the warning by explicitly requesting the OLD, or backward compatible behavior using the cmake_policy() command. It is also possible to request NEW, or non-backward compatible behavior for a policy, also avoiding the warning. Each policy can also be set to either NEW or OLD behavior explicitly on the command line with the CMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN> variable.
trans-unit.target: CMake中的策略用于保留多个版本之间的向后兼容行为。当引入新策略时，较新的CMake版本将开始警告向后兼容行为。通过使用 cmake_policy() 命令显式请求OLD或向后兼容的行为，可以禁用警告。也可以请求策略的 NEW 或非向后兼容行为，也避免出现警告。也可以使用 CMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN> 变量在命令行上将每个策略显式设置为 NEW 或 OLD 行为。

trans-unit.source: Policy CMP0042 was introduced to change the default value of MACOSX_RPATH to TRUE. This is because use of @rpath is a more flexible and powerful alternative to @executable_path and @loader_path.
trans-unit.target: 引入了策略 CMP0042 ，以将MACOSX_RPATH的默认值 MACOSX_RPATH 为 TRUE 。这是因为使用 @rpath 是 @executable_path 和 @loader_path 的更灵活，更强大的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: Policy CMP0102 affects the behavior of the mark_as_advanced call. When set to NEW, variables passed to this command which are not already in the cache are ignored. See policy CMP0102.
trans-unit.target: 策略 CMP0102 影响 mark_as_advanced 调用的行为。设置为 NEW 时，将忽略传递给此命令的尚未在缓存中的变量。请参阅策略 CMP0102 。

trans-unit.source: Policy CMP0003 was introduced with the intention of always linking library files by full path when a full path is given to the target_link_libraries() command. However, on some platforms (e.g. HP-UX) the compiler front-end adds alternative library search paths for the current architecture (e.g. /usr/lib/<arch> has alternatives to libraries in /usr/lib for the current architecture). On such platforms the find_library() may find a library such as /usr/lib/libfoo.so that does not belong to the current architecture.
trans-unit.target: 引入策略 CMP0003 的目的是，在为 target_link_libraries() 命令提供完整路径时，始终按完整路径链接库文件。但是，在某些平台（例如HP-UX）上，编译器前端为当前体系结构添加了替代的库搜索路径（例如， /usr/lib/<arch> 对于当前体系结构具有 /usr/lib 中的库的替代方案）。在这样的平台上， find_library() 可能会找到不属于当前体系结构的库，例如 /usr/lib/libfoo.so 。

trans-unit.source: Policy CMP0114 provides compatibility for projects that have not been updated to expect the new behavior. The OLD behavior for this policy is to use the above-documented behavior from 3.18 and below. The NEW behavior for this policy is to use the above-documented behavior preferred by 3.19 and above.
trans-unit.target: 策略 CMP0114 为尚未更新的项目提供兼容性，以期望新的行为。此策略的 OLD 行为是使用上面记录的3.18及以下版本的行为。此策略的 NEW 行为是使用3.19及更高版本首选的上述行为。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling C language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine C compiler, after which the value for CC is stored in the cache as CMAKE_C_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_C_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 C 语言文件的首选可执行文件。CMake将仅在第一个配置上使用它来确定 C 编译器，之后 CC 的值将以 CMAKE_C_COMPILER 的形式存储在高速缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_C_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling CSharp language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CSharp default compilation flags, after which the value for CSFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 CSharp 语言文件的首选可执行文件。将只使用CMake的第一配置，以确定 CSharp 默认编译标志，在这之后的值 CSFLAGS 存储在缓存中 CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling CUDA language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CUDA compiler, after which the value for CUDA is stored in the cache as CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 CUDA 语言文件的首选可执行文件。 CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 CUDA 编译器，此后 CUDA 的值将以 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER 的形式存储在缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling CXX language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CXX compiler, after which the value for CXX is stored in the cache as CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 CXX 语言文件的首选可执行文件。 CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 CXX 编译器，之后 CXX 的值将以 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER 的形式存储在缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling Fortran language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine Fortran compiler, after which the value for Fortran is stored in the cache as CMAKE_Fortran_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_Fortran_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 Fortran 语言文件的首选可执行文件。 CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 Fortran 编译器，之后， Fortran 的值将以 CMAKE_Fortran_COMPILER 的形式存储在缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_Fortran_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling ISPC language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine ISPC compiler, after which the value for ISPC is stored in the cache as CMAKE_ISPC_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_ISPC_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 ISPC 语言文件的首选可执行文件。CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 ISPC 编译器，然后将 ISPC 的值作为 CMAKE_ISPC_COMPILER 存储在高速缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_ISPC_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling OBJC language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine OBJC compiler, after which the value for OBJC is stored in the cache as CMAKE_OBJC_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_OBJC_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 OBJC 语言文件的首选可执行文件。将仅用于由CMake的在第一配置，以确定 OBJC 编译器，在这之后的值 OBJC 被存储在高速缓存中为 CMAKE_OBJC_COMPILER 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_OBJC_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling OBJCXX language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine OBJCXX compiler, after which the value for OBJCXX is stored in the cache as CMAKE_OBJCXX_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_OBJCXX_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 OBJCXX 语言文件的首选可执行文件。将仅用于由CMake的在第一配置，以确定 OBJCXX 编译器，在这之后的值 OBJCXX 被存储在高速缓存中为 CMAKE_OBJCXX_COMPILER 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_OBJCXX_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling Swift language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine Swift compiler, after which the value for SWIFTC is stored in the cache as CMAKE_Swift_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_Swift_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 Swift 语言文件的首选可执行文件。将仅用于由CMake的在第一配置，以确定 Swift 编译器，在这之后的值 SWIFTC 被存储在高速缓存中为 CMAKE_Swift_COMPILER 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_Swift_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling resource files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine resource compiler, after which the value for RC is stored in the cache as CMAKE_RC_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_RC_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于编译 resource 文件的首选可执行文件。 CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 resource 编译器，然后将 RC 的值作为 CMAKE_RC_COMPILER 存储在高速缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_RC_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling a specific dialect of assembly language files. ASM<DIALECT> can be ASM, ASM_NASM (Netwide Assembler), ASM_MASM (Microsoft Assembler) or ASM-ATT (Assembler AT&T). Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine ASM<DIALECT> compiler, after which the value for ASM<DIALECT> is stored in the cache as CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_COMPILER. For subsequent configuration runs, the environment variable will be ignored in favor of CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_COMPILER.
trans-unit.target: 首选的可执行文件，用于编译汇编语言文件的特定方言。 ASM<DIALECT> 可以是 ASM ， ASM_NASM （Netwide汇编程序）， ASM_MASM （Microsoft汇编程序）或 ASM-ATT （汇编程序AT＆T）。 CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 ASM<DIALECT> 编译器，之后 ASM<DIALECT> 的值将以 CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_COMPILER 形式存储在缓存中。对于后续配置运行，将忽略环境变量，而使用 CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_COMPILER 。

trans-unit.source: Preferred executable for compiling host code when compiling CUDA language files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CUDA host compiler, after which the value for CUDAHOSTCXX is stored in the cache as CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 CUDA 语言文件时用于编译主机代码的首选可执行文件。CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 CUDA 主机编译器，然后将 CUDAHOSTCXX 的值存储为 CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

If a matching file is executable, its prerequisites are listed.

trans-unit.source: Prints each trace line in a human-readable format. This is the default format.

trans-unit.source: Prior to CMake 3.13 the target_link_libraries() command did not accept targets not created in the calling directory as its first argument for calls that update the LINK_LIBRARIES of the target itself. It did accidentally accept targets from other directories on calls that only update the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES, but would simply add entries to the property as if the call were made in the original directory. Thus link interface libraries specified this way were always looked up by generators in the scope of the original target rather than in the scope that called target_link_libraries().
trans-unit.target: 在CMake 3.13之前， target_link_libraries() 命令不接受未在调用目录中创建的目标作为其更新目标自身 LINK_LIBRARIES 的调用的第一个参数。它确实在调用中意外地接受了其他目录中的目标，这些目标仅更新了 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES ，而只是将条目添加到属性中，就好像在原始目录中进行了调用一样。因此，生成器总是在原始目标的范围内而不是在称为 target_link_libraries() 的范围内查找以这种方式指定的链接接口库。

trans-unit.source: Prior to policy CMP0003 projects would still build in such cases because the incorrect library path would be converted to -lfoo on the link line and the linker would find the proper library in the arch-specific search path provided by the compiler front-end implicitly. At the time we chose to remain compatible with such projects by always converting library files found in implicit link directories to -lfoo flags to ask the linker to search for them. This approach allowed existing projects to continue to build while still linking to libraries outside implicit link directories via full path (such as those in the build tree).
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，在策略 CMP0003 之前的项目仍将继续构建，因为错误的库路径将在链接行上转换为 -lfoo ，并且链接器会在编译器前端提供的特定于arch的搜索路径中隐式找到正确的库。当时我们选择通过始终将在隐式链接目录中找到的库文件转换为 -lfoo 标志来要求链接程序进行搜索，从而与此类项目保持兼容。这种方法允许现有项目继续构建，同时仍通过完整路径（例如，构建树中的路径）链接到隐式链接目录外部的库。

trans-unit.source: Proceeds as in WINDOWS_COMMAND mode if the host system is Windows. Otherwise proceeds as in UNIX_COMMAND mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机系统是Windows ， WINDOWS_COMMAND 模式进行。否则按 UNIX_COMMAND 模式进行。

trans-unit.source: Process the given cmake file as a script written in the CMake language. No configure or generate step is performed and the cache is not modified. If variables are defined using -D, this must be done before the -P argument.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的cmake文件作为以CMake语言编写的脚本进行处理。不执行配置或生成步骤，并且不修改缓存。如果使用 -D 定义变量，则必须在 -P 参数之前完成。

trans-unit.source: Project Commands
trans-unit.target: 项目命令

trans-unit.source: Project binary directory to be built. This is required and must be first.
trans-unit.target: 要构建的项目二进制目录。这是必须的,而且必须是第一个。

trans-unit.source: Project binary directory to install. This is required and must be first.
trans-unit.target: 要安装的项目二进制目录。这是必须的,而且必须是第一个。

trans-unit.source: Project generators like Xcode where the user can switch target architecture at build time, but a full path to a library cannot be used because it only provides one architecture (i.e. it is not a universal binary).
trans-unit.target: 像Xcode这样的项目生成器,用户可以在构建时切换目标架构,但不能使用库的完整路径,因为它只提供一种架构(即它不是通用二进制)。

trans-unit.source: Project homepage URL. The default value is taken from the CMAKE_PROJECT_HOMEPAGE_URL variable, which is set by the top level project() command, or else the default will be empty if no URL was provided to project().
trans-unit.target: 项目主页URL。默认值来自 CMAKE_PROJECT_HOMEPAGE_URL 变量，该变量由顶级 project() 命令设置，否则，如果没有为 project() 提供URL，则默认值为空。

trans-unit.source: Project objects define one (sub-)project defined in the cmake build system.
trans-unit.target: 项目对象定义了一个在cmake构建系统中定义的(子)项目。

trans-unit.source: Project source code may depend on, or be conditional on, the availability of certain features of the compiler. There are three use-cases which arise: Compile Feature Requirements, Optional Compile Features and Conditional Compilation Options.
trans-unit.target: 项目源代码可能取决于或取决于编译器某些功能的可用性。出现了三个用例：编译功能要求，可选编译功能和条件编译选项。

trans-unit.source: Projects built by try_compile() and try_run() are built synchronously during the CMake configuration step. Therefore a specific build configuration must be chosen even if the generated build system supports multiple configurations.
trans-unit.target: 由 try_compile() 和 try_run() 生成的项目是在CMake配置步骤中同步生成的。因此，即使生成的构建系统支持多种配置，也必须选择特定的构建配置。

trans-unit.source: Projects can prevent an individual source file from being combined into a unity source by setting its SKIP_UNITY_BUILD_INCLUSION source property to true. This can be a more effective way to prevent problems with specific files than disabling unity builds for an entire target.
trans-unit.target: 通过将项目的 SKIP_UNITY_BUILD_INCLUSION 源属性设置为true，项目可以防止将单个源文件合并为一个统一的源文件。与禁用整个目标的统一构建相比，这是防止特定文件出现问题的更有效方法。

trans-unit.source: Projects don’t always need to add the populated content to the build. Sometimes the project just wants to make the downloaded content available at a predictable location. The next example ensures that a set of standard company toolchain files (and potentially even the toolchain binaries themselves) is available early enough to be used for that same build.
trans-unit.target: 项目并不总是需要将填充的内容添加到构建中。有时项目只是想使下载的内容在可预测的位置可用。下一个示例确保了一组标准公司工具链文件（甚至可能还有工具链二进制文件本身）足够早地可用以用于同一构建。

trans-unit.source: Projects may also get and set the property directly, but must be aware that adding directories to this property does not make those directories used during compilation. Adding directories to this property marks directories as SYSTEM which otherwise would be used in a non-SYSTEM manner. This can appear similar to ‘duplication’, so prefer the high-level target_include_directories(SYSTEM) command and avoid setting the property by low-level means.
trans-unit.target: 项目也可以直接获取和设置该属性，但必须注意，向该属性添加目录不会使那些目录在编译期间使用。将目录添加到此属性会将目录标记为 SYSTEM ，否则将以非 SYSTEM 方式使用。这看起来类似于“复制”，因此最好使用高级 target_include_directories(SYSTEM) 命令，并避免通过低级方式设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Projects may skip IMPORTED_OBJECTS if the configuration-specific property IMPORTED_OBJECTS_<CONFIG> is set instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果改为设置了特定于配置的属性 IMPORTED_OBJECTS_<CONFIG> ,则项目可能会跳过 IMPORTED_OBJECTS 。

trans-unit.source: Projects may use the OpenGL::GL target (or OPENGL_LIBRARIES variable) to use legacy GL interfaces. These will use the legacy GL library located by OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY, if available. If OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY is empty or not found and GLVND is available, the OpenGL::GL target will use GLVND OpenGL::OpenGL and OpenGL::GLX (and the OPENGL_LIBRARIES variable will use the corresponding libraries). Thus, for non-EGL-based Linux targets, the OpenGL::GL target is most portable.
trans-unit.target: 项目可以使用 OpenGL::GL 目标（或 OPENGL_LIBRARIES 变量）来使用旧版GL接口。它们将使用 OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY 定位的旧版GL库（如果有）。如果 OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY 为空或未找到且GLVND可用，则 OpenGL::GL 目标将使用GLVND OpenGL::OpenGL 和 OpenGL::GLX （而 OPENGL_LIBRARIES 变量将使用相应的库）。因此，对于非基于EGL的Linux目标， OpenGL::GL 目标是最可移植的。

trans-unit.source: Projects should generally avoid using PUBLIC or INTERFACE for targets that will be exported, or they should at least use the $<BUILD_INTERFACE:...> generator expression to prevent precompile headers from appearing in an installed exported target. Consumers of a target should typically be in control of what precompile headers they use, not have precompile headers forced on them by the targets being consumed (since precompile headers are not typically usage requirements). A notable exception to this is where an interface library is created to define a commonly used set of precompile headers in one place and then other targets link to that interface library privately. In this case, the interface library exists specifically to propagate the precompile headers to its consumers and the consumer is effectively still in control, since it decides whether to link to the interface library or not.
trans-unit.target: 项目通常应避免对将要导出的目标使用 PUBLIC 或 INTERFACE ，或者项目应至少使用 $<BUILD_INTERFACE:...> 生成器表达式来防止预编译头出现在已安装的导出目标中。目标的使用者通常应控制自己使用的预编译头，而不要使用消耗的目标在其上强加预编译头（因为通常不要求使用预编译头）。一个明显的例外是接口库在哪里被创建用于在一个位置定义一组常用的预编译头，然后其他目标私下链接到该接口库。在这种情况下，接口库专门存在用于将预编译头传播到其使用方，并且使用方实际上仍处于控制状态，因为它决定是否链接到接口库。

trans-unit.source: Projects should not directly set the UNITY_BUILD property or its associated CMAKE_UNITY_BUILD variable to true. Depending on the capabilities of the build machine and compiler used, it might or might not be appropriate to enable unity builds. Therefore, this feature should be under developer control, which would normally be through the developer choosing whether or not to set the CMAKE_UNITY_BUILD variable on the cmake(1) command line or some other equivalent method. However, it IS recommended to set the UNITY_BUILD target property to false if it is known that enabling unity builds for the target can lead to problems.
trans-unit.target: 项目不应直接将 UNITY_BUILD 属性或其关联的 CMAKE_UNITY_BUILD 变量设置为true。取决于所使用的构建机器和编译器的功能，启用统一构建可能合适也可能不合适。因此，此功能应在开发人员控制下，通常是通过开发人员选择是否在 cmake(1) 命令行或其他等效方法上设置 CMAKE_UNITY_BUILD 变量。但是，如果已知为目标启用统一构建会导致问题，则建议将 UNITY_BUILD 目标属性设置为false。

trans-unit.source: Projects should not set CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT_SHOW. It is intended for users so that they may control whether or not to include context with messages.
trans-unit.target: 项目不应设置 CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT_SHOW 。旨在供用户使用，以便他们可以控制是否在消息中包括上下文。

trans-unit.source: Projects should not set this variable, it is intended as a developer control to be set on the cmake(1) command line or other equivalent methods. The developer must have the ability to enable or disable unity builds according to the capabilities of their own machine and compiler.
trans-unit.target: 项目不应设置此变量，而应将其用作在 cmake(1) 命令行或其他等效方法上设置的开发人员控件。开发人员必须具有根据其自身计算机和编译器的功能启用或禁用统一构建的能力。

trans-unit.source: Projects should not set this variable, it is intended for users so that they may control the log level according to their own needs.
trans-unit.target: 项目不应该设置这个变量,它是为用户准备的,以便用户可以根据自己的需要控制日志级别。

trans-unit.source: Projects should not set this variable. It will be populated with the set of files and directories passed to doxygen_add_docs(), thereby providing consistent behavior with the other built-in commands like add_executable(), add_library() and add_custom_target(). If a variable named DOXYGEN_INPUT is set by the project, it will be ignored and a warning will be issued.
trans-unit.target: 项目不应设置此变量。它将使用传递到 doxygen_add_docs() 的文件和目录集来填充，从而与其他内置命令（如 add_executable() ， add_library() 和 add_custom_target() )提供一致的行为。如果项目设置了名为 DOXYGEN_INPUT 的变量，它将被忽略并发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Projects using this module should use #include "al.h" to include the OpenAL header file, not#include <AL/al.h>. The reason for this is that the latter is not entirely portable. Windows/Creative Labs does not by default put their headers in AL/ and macOS uses the convention <OpenAL/al.h>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此模块的项目应使用 #include "al.h" 包含OpenAL头文件，而不是 #include <AL/al.h> 。这样做的原因是后者并非完全可移植。Windows / Creative Labs默认情况下不将其标头放在 AL/ 并且macOS使用约定 <OpenAL/al.h> 。

trans-unit.source: Projects wishing to follow the common practice of installing headers into a project-specific subdirectory will need to provide a destination rather than rely on the above.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目希望遵循通常的做法,将头文件安装到特定项目的子目录中,则需要提供一个目的地,而不是依赖上述内容。

trans-unit.source: Provides an option for the user to select as ON or OFF. If no initial <value> is provided, OFF is used. If <variable> is already set as a normal variable then the command does nothing (see policy CMP0077).

trans-unit.source: Provides greater control over when gtest_discover_tests() performs test discovery. By default, POST_BUILD sets up a post-build command to perform test discovery at build time. In certain scenarios, like cross-compiling, this POST_BUILD behavior is not desirable. By contrast, PRE_TEST delays test discovery until just prior to test execution. This way test discovery occurs in the target environment where the test has a better chance at finding appropriate runtime dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 gtest_discover_tests() 执行测试发现的时间的更好控制。默认情况下， POST_BUILD 设置构建后命令以在构建时执行测试发现。在某些情况下，例如交叉编译，这种 POST_BUILD 行为是不可取的。相比之下， PRE_TEST 将测试发现延迟到测试执行之前。这种方式的测试发现发生在目标环境中，在该环境中，测试更有可能找到合适的运行时依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Qt relies on some bundled tools for code generation, such as moc for meta-object code generation, uic for widget layout and population, and rcc for virtual file system content generation. These tools may be automatically invoked by cmake(1) if the appropriate conditions are met. The automatic tool invocation may be used with both Qt 4 and Qt 5.
trans-unit.target: Qt依赖于一些捆绑的代码生成工具，例如 moc 用于元对象代码生成， uic 用于小部件布局和填充，以及 rcc 用于虚拟文件系统内容生成。如果满足适当的条件，这些工具可以由 cmake(1) 自动调用。自动工具调用可以与Qt 4和Qt 5一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Read content from a file called <filename> and store it in a <variable>. Optionally start from the given <offset> and read at most <max-in> bytes. The HEX option causes data to be converted to a hexadecimal representation (useful for binary data). If the HEX option is specified, letters in the output (a through f) are in lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 从名为 <filename> 的文件中读取内容，并将其存储在 <variable> 中。（可选）从给定的 <offset> 开始，最多读取 <max-in> 个字节。在 HEX 选项原因数据被转换为十六进制表示（二进制数据是有用的）。如果指定了 HEX 选项，则输出（ a 到 f ）中的字母均为小写。

trans-unit.source: References a library file located outside the project. The IMPORTED_LOCATION target property (or its per-configuration variant IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG>) specifies the location of the main library file on disk. In the case of a SHARED library on Windows, the IMPORTED_IMPLIB target property (or its per-configuration variant IMPORTED_IMPLIB_<CONFIG>) specifies the location of the DLL import library file (.lib or .dll.a) on disk, and the IMPORTED_LOCATION is the location of the .dll runtime library (and is optional). Additional usage requirements may be specified in INTERFACE_* properties.
trans-unit.target: 引用位于项目外部的库文件。所述 IMPORTED_LOCATION 目标属性（或它的每构变体 IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> ）指定在磁盘上的主库文件的位置。在的情况下 SHARED 在Windows中，库 IMPORTED_IMPLIB 目标属性（或它的每构变体 IMPORTED_IMPLIB_<CONFIG> )指定了DLL的导入库文件（的位置 .lib 或 .dll.a 在磁盘上），且 IMPORTED_LOCATION 是 .dll 运行时库的位置（是可选的）。可以在 INTERFACE_* 中指定其他使用要求 属性。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of which population method is used, when using the declare-populate pattern with a hierarchical project arrangement, projects at higher levels in the hierarchy are able to override the population details of content specified anywhere lower in the project hierarchy. The ability to detect whether content has already been populated ensures that even if multiple child projects want certain content to be available, the first one to populate it wins. The other child project can simply make use of the already available content instead of repeating the population for itself. See the Examples section which demonstrates this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 无论使用哪种填充方法，当在具有分层项目安排的情况下使用声明填充模式时，层次结构中较高级别的项目都可以覆盖在项目层次结构中较低位置指定的内容的填充详细信息。检测内容是否已经填充的能力确保即使多个子项目都希望某些内容可用，第一个填充它的项目还是会获胜。另一个子项目可以简单地利用已经可用的内容，而不必自己重复填充。请参阅“ 示例”部分，该示例演示了此方案。

trans-unit.source: Removes a normal variable from the current scope, causing it to become undefined. If CACHE is present, then a cache variable is removed instead of a normal variable. Note that when evaluating Variable References of the form ${VAR}, CMake first searches for a normal variable with that name. If no such normal variable exists, CMake will then search for a cache entry with that name. Because of this unsetting a normal variable can expose a cache variable that was previously hidden. To force a variable reference of the form ${VAR} to return an empty string, use set(<variable> ""), which clears the normal variable but leaves it defined.
trans-unit.target: 从当前作用域中删除一个普通变量，使其变为未定义状态。如果存在 CACHE ，则将删除一个缓存变量，而不是普通变量。请注意，在评估形式 ${VAR} 变量引用时，CMake首先搜索具有该名称的普通变量。如果不存在这样的标准变量，CMake将搜索具有该名称的缓存条目。由于此取消设置，普通变量可以公开以前隐藏的缓存变量。要强制使用 ${VAR} 形式的变量引用返回空字符串，请使用 set(<variable> "") ，它会清除普通变量，但保留其定义状态。

trans-unit.source: Reply files (including the index file) will never be replaced by files of the same name but different content. This allows a client to read the files concurrently with a running CMake that may generate a new reply. However, after generating a new reply CMake will attempt to remove reply files from previous runs that it did not just write. If a client attempts to read a reply file referenced by the index but finds the file missing, that means a concurrent CMake has generated a new reply. The client may simply start again by reading the new reply index file.
trans-unit.target: 回复文件(包括索引文件)永远不会被同名但不同内容的文件所取代。这就允许客户端与正在运行的CMake同时读取文件,而CMake可能会生成一个新的回复。然而,在生成一个新的回复后,CMake将试图从之前的运行中删除它没有刚刚写入的回复文件。如果客户端试图读取索引所引用的回复文件,但发现文件不见了,这意味着一个并发的CMake已经生成了一个新的回复。客户端可以简单地重新开始读取新的回复索引文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns from a file, directory or function. When this command is encountered in an included file (via include() or find_package()), it causes processing of the current file to stop and control is returned to the including file. If it is encountered in a file which is not included by another file, e.g. a CMakeLists.txt, control is returned to the parent directory if there is one. If return is called in a function, control is returned to the caller of the function.
trans-unit.target: 从文件，目录或函数返回。在包含文件中（通过 include() 或 find_package() ）遇到此命令时，它将导致当前文件的处理停止，并且控制权返回到包含文件。如果在另一个文件（例如 CMakeLists.txt ）未包含的文件中遇到它，则如果存在，则控制权返回到父目录。如果在函数中调用return，则将控制权返回给函数的调用者。

trans-unit.source: Returns from a file, directory or function. If return is called in a function, control is returned to the caller of the function.

trans-unit.source: Running CMake without specifying CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME will run the configure step in host mode assuming a standard Linux environment. If not overridden, the PrgEnv-* compiler wrappers will end up getting used, which if targeting the either the login node or compute node, is likely not the desired behavior. The exception to this would be if you are building directly on a NID instead of cross-compiling from a login node. If trying to build software for a login node, you will need to either first unload the currently loaded PrgEnv-* module or explicitly tell CMake to use the system compilers in /usr/bin instead of the Cray wrappers. If instead targeting a compute node is desired, just specify the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME as mentioned above.
trans-unit.target: 在没有指定 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 的情况下运行CMake，将在标准Linux环境下以主机模式运行configure步骤。如果不被覆盖，则 PrgEnv-* 编译器包装器最终将被使用，如果以登录节点或计算节点为目标，则可能不是期望的行为。例外是，如果您直接在NID上构建而不是从登录节点交叉编译。如果尝试为登录节点构建软件，则需要先卸载当前加载的 PrgEnv-* 模块，或者显式告诉CMake在 /usr/bin 中使用系统编译器，而不是Cray包装器。如果相反需要使用计算节点，则只需指定 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 正如刚才提到的。

trans-unit.source: Same as REBASE except if the rebase fails, an annotated tag will be created at the original HEAD position from before the rebase and then checkout GIT_TAG just like the CHECKOUT strategy. The message stored on the annotated tag will give information about what was attempted and the tag name will include a timestamp so that each failed run will add a new tag. This strategy ensures no changes will be lost, but updates should always succeed if GIT_TAG refers to a valid ref unless there are uncommitted changes that cannot be popped successfully.
trans-unit.target: 与 REBASE 相同，只是如果重新设置失败，将从重新设置之前的原始 HEAD 位置创建带注释的标签，然后像 CHECKOUT 策略一样签出 GIT_TAG 。存储在带注释的标签上的消息将提供有关尝试内容的信息，标签名称将包含时间戳记，以便每次失败的运行都将添加一个新标签。此策略可确保不会丢失任何更改，但如果 GIT_TAG 引用了有效的引用，则更新应始终成功，除非存在未提交的更改无法成功弹出的情况。

trans-unit.source: Saves a matched subexpression, which can be referenced in the REGEX REPLACE operation. Additionally it is saved by all regular expression-related commands, including e.g. if(MATCHES), in the variables CMAKE_MATCH_<n> for <n> 0..9.
trans-unit.target: 保存匹配的子表达式，可以在 REGEX REPLACE 操作中引用该子表达式。另外，它由所有与正则表达式相关的命令（例如 if(MATCHES) )保存在变量 CMAKE_MATCH_<n> 中,用于 <n> 0..9。

trans-unit.source: Scans <bundle> bundle recursively for all <exes_var> executable files and accumulates them into a variable.
trans-unit.target: 递归扫描 <bundle> 捆绑软件以查找所有 <exes_var> 可执行文件，并将其累积到变量中。

trans-unit.source: Schedule the call for the end of the given directory instead of the current directory. The <dir> may reference either a source directory or its corresponding binary directory. Relative paths are treated as relative to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 将呼叫安排在给定目录的末尾而不是当前目录的末尾。所述 <dir> 可以引用任一个源目录或其相应的二进制目录。相对路径被视为相对于当前源目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: Schedules a call to the named <command> with the given arguments (if any) to occur at a later time. By default, deferred calls are executed as if written at the end of the current directory’s CMakeLists.txt file, except that they run even after a return() call. Variable references in arguments are evaluated at the time the deferred call is executed.
trans-unit.target: 计划使用给定参数（如果有）对命名为 <command> 的调用在以后发生。默认情况下，延迟调用的执行就像写在当前目录的 CMakeLists.txt 文件的末尾一样，除了它们即使在 return() 调用之后仍会运行。在执行延迟调用时会评估参数中的变量引用。

trans-unit.source: Search paths specified in cmake-specific cache variables. These are intended to be used on the command line with a -DVAR=value. trans-unit.target: 在特定于cmake的缓存变量中指定的搜索路径。这些旨在与 -DVAR=value 一起在命令行上使用。这些值被解释为以分号分隔的list。这可如果跳过 NO_CMAKE_PATH 传递或通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_USE_CMAKE_PATH 到 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Search paths specified in cmake-specific environment variables. These are intended to be set in the user’s shell configuration, and therefore use the host’s native path separator (; on Windows and : on UNIX). This can be skipped if NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH is passed or by setting the CMAKE_FIND_USE_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH to FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 在特定于cmake的环境变量中指定的搜索路径。这些意在用户的外壳配置进行设置，并因此使用主机的本地路径分隔（ ; 在Windows和 : 在UNIX上）。这可如果跳过 NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH 传递或通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_USE_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH 到 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Search paths specified in cmake-specific environment variables. These are intended to be set in the user’s shell configuration, and therefore use the host’s native path separator (; on Windows and : on UNIX). This can be skipped if NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH is passed.

trans-unit.source: Search paths specified in cmake-specific environment variables. These are intended to be set in the user’s shell configuration, and therefore use the host’s native path separator (; on Windows and : on UNIX). This can be skipped if NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH is passed:
trans-unit.target: 在特定于cmake的环境变量中指定的搜索路径。这些意在用户的外壳配置进行设置，并因此使用主机的本地路径分隔（ ; 在Windows和 : 在UNIX上）。如果传递了 NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH ,则可以跳过此操作：

trans-unit.source: Search paths specified in the <PackageName>_ROOT CMake variable and the <PackageName>_ROOT environment variable, where <PackageName> is the package to be found. The package root variables are maintained as a stack so if called from within a find module, root paths from the parent’s find module will also be searched after paths for the current package. This can be skipped if NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH is passed or by setting the CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH to FALSE. See policy CMP0074.
trans-unit.target: 在 <PackageName>_ROOT CMake变量和 <PackageName>_ROOT 环境变量中指定的搜索路径，其中 <PackageName> 是要查找的软件包。包的根变量作为堆栈维护，因此如果从查找模块中调用，则还将在当前包的路径之后搜索父级查找模块的根路径。如果通过了 NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH 或将 CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH 设置为 FALSE ,则可以跳过此操作。请参阅策略 CMP0074 。

trans-unit.source: Search paths specified in the <PackageName>_ROOT CMake variable and the <PackageName>_ROOT environment variable, where <PackageName> is the package to be found. The package root variables are maintained as a stack so if called from within a find module, root paths from the parent’s find module will also be searched after paths for the current package. This can be skipped if NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH is passed. See policy CMP0074.
trans-unit.target: 在 <PackageName>_ROOT CMake变量和 <PackageName>_ROOT 环境变量中指定的搜索路径，其中 <PackageName> 是要查找的软件包。包的根变量作为堆栈维护，因此，如果从查找模块中调用根包，则还将在当前包的路径之后搜索父级查找模块的根路径。如果传递了 NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH ,则可以跳过。请参阅策略 CMP0074 。

trans-unit.source: Search paths stored in the CMake System Package Registry. This can be skipped if NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is passed or by setting the CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY to TRUE. See the cmake-packages(7) manual for details on the system package registry.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径存储在CMake 系统软件包注册表中。这可如果跳过 NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 传递或通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 到 TRUE 。有关系统软件包注册表的详细信息，请参见 cmake-packages(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: Search paths stored in the CMake System Package Registry. This can be skipped if NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is passed or by setting the CMAKE_FIND_USE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY variable to FALSE or the deprecated variable CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY to TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径存储在CMake系统软件包注册表中。这可以如果跳过 NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 被传递或通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_USE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 变量 FALSE 或弃用可变 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 到 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Search paths stored in the CMake User Package Registry. This can be skipped if NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is passed or by setting the CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY to TRUE. See the cmake-packages(7) manual for details on the user package registry.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径存储在CMake 用户软件包注册表中。这可如果跳过 NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 传递或通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 到 TRUE 。有关用户软件包注册表的详细信息，请参见 cmake-packages(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: Search paths stored in the CMake User Package Registry. This can be skipped if NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is passed or by setting the variable CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY to FALSE or the deprecated variable CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY to TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径存储在CMake用户软件包注册表中。如果传递了 NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 或将变量 CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 设置为 FALSE 或不赞成使用的变量 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 设置为 TRUE ,则可以跳过此操作。

trans-unit.source: Search the paths specified by the HINTS option. These should be paths computed by system introspection, such as a hint provided by the location of another item already found. Hard-coded guesses should be specified with the PATHS option.

trans-unit.source: See the install(DIRECTORY) command for documentation of permissions, FILES_MATCHING, PATTERN, REGEX, and EXCLUDE options. Copying directories preserves the structure of their content even if options are used to select a subset of files.

trans-unit.source: See the CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> variable to set attributes on all targets in a directory tree.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> 变量以在目录树中的所有目标上设置属性。

trans-unit.source: See the DEPENDS option of add_custom_target() and add_custom_command() commands for adding file-level dependencies in custom rules. See the OBJECT_DEPENDS source file property to add file-level dependencies to object files.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 add_custom_target() 和 add_custom_command() 命令的 DEPENDS 选项，以在自定义规则中添加文件级依赖项。请参阅 OBJECT_DEPENDS 源文件属性，以将文件级依赖项添加到目标文件。

trans-unit.source: See the XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> target property to set attributes on a specific target.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> 目标属性以在特定目标上设置属性。

trans-unit.source: See the counterpart property RULE_MESSAGES to disable everything except for target completion messages.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅对方属性 RULE_MESSAGES 以禁用除目标完成消息以外的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: See the global property of the same name for details. This overrides the global and directory property for a target.
trans-unit.target: 详见同名的全局属性。这将覆盖目标的全局和目录属性。

trans-unit.source: See the global property of the same name for details. This overrides the global property for a directory.
trans-unit.target: 详见同名的全局属性。这将覆盖目录的全局属性。

trans-unit.source: See variable CMAKE_<CONFIG>_POSTFIX.
trans-unit.target: 参见变量 CMAKE_<CONFIG>_POSTFIX 。

trans-unit.source: Select the CUDA runtime library for use by compilers targeting the CUDA language.
trans-unit.target: 选择CUDA运行时库,供针对CUDA语言的编译器使用。

trans-unit.source: Select the CUDA runtime library for use when compiling and linking CUDA. This variable is used to initialize the CUDA_RUNTIME_LIBRARY property on all targets as they are created.
trans-unit.target: 选择在编译和链接CUDA时使用的CUDA运行时库。此变量用于在创建所有目标时初始化它们的 CUDA_RUNTIME_LIBRARY 属性。

trans-unit.source: Select the MSVC runtime library for use by compilers targeting the MSVC ABI.
trans-unit.target: 选择MSVC运行时库,供针对MSVC ABI的编译器使用。

trans-unit.source: Select the MSVC runtime library for use by compilers targeting the MSVC ABI. This variable is used to initialize the MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY property on all targets as they are created. It is also propagated by calls to the try_compile() command into the test project.
trans-unit.target: 选择MSVC运行时库，以供面向MSVC ABI的编译器使用。该变量用于在创建所有目标时初始化它们的 MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY 属性。也可以通过调用 try_compile() 命令将其传播到测试项目中。

trans-unit.source: SelectLibraryConfigurations
trans-unit.target: SelectLibraryConfigurations

trans-unit.source: Selecting a Target
trans-unit.target: 选择目标

trans-unit.source: Selects the behavior of the module. This is a boolean variable:
trans-unit.target: 选择模块的行为。这是一个布尔变量。

trans-unit.source: Selects which programming languages are needed to build the project. Supported languages include C, CXX (i.e. C++), CUDA, Fortran, and ASM. By default C and CXX are enabled if no language options are given. Specify language NONE, or use the LANGUAGES keyword and list no languages, to skip enabling any languages.
trans-unit.target: 选择构建项目所需的编程语言。支持的语言包括 C ， CXX （即C ++）， CUDA ， Fortran 和 ASM 。如果没有给出语言选项，默认情况下启用 C 和 CXX 。指定语言 NONE ，或使用 LANGUAGES 关键字并且不列出任何语言，以跳过启用任何语言的操作。

trans-unit.source: Selects which programming languages are needed to build the project. Supported languages include C, CXX (i.e. C++), CUDA, OBJC (i.e. Objective-C), OBJCXX, Fortran, ISPC, and ASM. By default C and CXX are enabled if no language options are given. Specify language NONE, or use the LANGUAGES keyword and list no languages, to skip enabling any languages.
trans-unit.target: 选择构建项目所需的编程语言。支持的语言包括 C ， CXX （即C ++）， CUDA ， OBJC （即Objective-C）， OBJCXX ， Fortran ， ISPC 和 ASM 。如果没有给出语言选项，默认情况下启用 C 和 CXX 。指定语言 NONE ，或使用 LANGUAGES 关键字并且不列出任何语言，以跳过启用任何语言的过程。

trans-unit.source: Semantic information about the CMake buildsystem itself.
trans-unit.target: 关于CMake构建系统本身的语义信息。

trans-unit.source: Server
trans-unit.target: Server

trans-unit.source: Set CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX near the beginning of the top-level CMakeLists.txt file:
trans-unit.target: 在顶级 CMakeLists.txt 文件的开头附近设置 CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX ：

trans-unit.source: Set <output> variable with details about any error.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <output> 变量，其中包含有关任何错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Set <result> variable to YES if IPO is supported by the compiler and NO otherwise. If this option is not given then the command will issue a fatal error if IPO is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果编译器支持IPO ，则将 <result> 变量设置为 YES ,否则设置为 NO 。如果未提供此选项，那么如果不支持IPO，则该命令将发出致命错误。

trans-unit.source: Set Boost_NO_BOOST_CMAKE to ON, to disable the search for boost-cmake.
trans-unit.target: 将 Boost_NO_BOOST_CMAKE 设置为 ON ，以禁用对boost-cmake的搜索。

trans-unit.source: Set CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG to TRUE to tell find_package() to first search using Config mode before falling back to Module mode.
trans-unit.target: 将 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG 设置为 TRUE ,以告诉 find_package() 首先使用Config模式进行搜索，然后再返回到Module模式。

trans-unit.source: Set CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_WARN_NO_MODULE to TRUE to tell find_package() to warn when it implicitly assumes Config mode. This helps developers enforce use of an explicit mode in all calls to find_package() within a project.
trans-unit.target: 将 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_WARN_NO_MODULE 设置为 TRUE ,以指示 find_package() 在隐式假定为Config模式时发出警告。这有助于开发人员在对的所有调用中强制使用显式模式 find_package() 在项目中 find_package（）的。

trans-unit.source: Set CUPS_REQUIRE_IPP_DELETE_ATTRIBUTE to TRUE if you need a version which features this function (i.e. at least 1.1.19)
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要具有此功能的版本， CUPS_REQUIRE_IPP_DELETE_ATTRIBUTE 设置为 TRUE 。 1.1.19 ）

trans-unit.source: Set CURL_NO_CURL_CMAKE to ON to disable this search.
trans-unit.target: 将 CURL_NO_CURL_CMAKE 设置为 ON 可禁用此搜索。

trans-unit.source: Set CURSES_NEED_NCURSES to TRUE before the find_package(Curses) call if NCurses functionality is required. Set CURSES_NEED_WIDE to TRUE before the find_package(Curses) call if unicode functionality is required.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CURSES_NEED_NCURSES 到 TRUE 的前 find_package(Curses) 调用如果需要ncurses的功能。将 CURSES_NEED_WIDE 设置为 TRUE ,然后 find_package(Curses) 调用如果需要的Unicode功能。

trans-unit.source: Set GDAL_DIR or GDAL_ROOT in the environment to specify the GDAL installation prefix.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GDAL_DIR 或 GDAL_ROOT 在环境中以指定GDAL安装前缀。

trans-unit.source: Set GSL_ROOT_DIR to a directory that contains a GSL installation.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GSL_ROOT_DIR 为包含GSL安装的目录。

trans-unit.source: Set MKLROOT environment variable to a directory that contains an MKL installation.
trans-unit.target: 设置 MKLROOT 环境变量为包含MKL安装的目录。

trans-unit.source: Set OPENSSL_ROOT_DIR to the root directory of an OpenSSL installation. Set OPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS to TRUE to look for static libraries. Set OPENSSL_MSVC_STATIC_RT set TRUE to choose the MT version of the lib.
trans-unit.target: 将 OPENSSL_ROOT_DIR 设置为OpenSSL安装的根目录。将 OPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS 设置为 TRUE ,以查找静态库。将 OPENSSL_MSVC_STATIC_RT 设置为 TRUE ,以选择库的MT版本。

trans-unit.source: Set true to get extra debugging output.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可获得更多调试输出。

trans-unit.source: Set true to skip trying to find hdf5-config.cmake.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可以跳过尝试查找 hdf5-config.cmake 的过程。

trans-unit.source: Set Cache Entry
trans-unit.target: 设置缓存条目

trans-unit.source: Set Environment Variable
trans-unit.target: 设置环境变量

trans-unit.source: Set Normal Variable
trans-unit.target: 设置正常变量

trans-unit.source: Set Xcode target attributes directly.
trans-unit.target: 直接设置Xcode目标属性。

trans-unit.source: Set a CPack variable. This will override any value set for <var> in the input file read by cpack.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个CPack变量。这将覆盖 cpack 读取的输入文件中为 <var> 设置的任何值。

trans-unit.source: Set a named property in a given scope.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的作用域中设置一个命名的属性。

trans-unit.source: Set a normal, cache, or environment variable to a given value. See the cmake-language(7) variables documentation for the scopes and interaction of normal variables and cache entries.
trans-unit.target: 将普通变量，缓存变量或环境变量设置为给定值。参见cmake-language（7）变量正常变量和缓存条目的范围和交互作用，文档。

trans-unit.source: Set a property of the tests.
trans-unit.target: 设置测试的一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Set a real time of day at which all tests should timeout. Example: 7:00:00 -0400. Any time format understood by the curl date parser is accepted. Local time is assumed if no timezone is specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有测试应超时的实时时间。例如：7： 7:00:00 -0400 ：00 -0400。接受卷曲日期解析器理解的任何时间格式。如果未指定时区，则假定为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Set a time at which all tests should stop running.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有测试停止运行的时间。

trans-unit.source: Set additional Visual Studio shader flags of a .hlsl source file.
trans-unit.target: 设置 .hlsl 源文件的其他Visual Studio着色器标志。

trans-unit.source: Set an element in <json-string> at the location given by the list of <member|index> arguments to <value>. The contents of <value> should be valid JSON.
trans-unit.target: 将 <json-string> 中的元素设置为 <value> 的 <member|index> 参数列表所指定的位置。 <value> 的内容应为有效的JSON。

trans-unit.source: Set any item metadata on a non-built file.
trans-unit.target: 设置非构建文件上的任何项目元数据。

trans-unit.source: Set any item metadata on all non-built files that use <tool>.
trans-unit.target: 在所有使用<tool>的非构建文件上设置任何项目元数据。

trans-unit.source: Set filename for output header file containing object code of a .hlsl source file.
trans-unit.target: 为包含 .hlsl 源文件的目标代码的输出头文件设置文件名。

trans-unit.source: Set if shared libraries may be named like archives.
trans-unit.target: 设置共享图书馆是否可以像档案馆一样命名。

trans-unit.source: Set name of variable in header file containing object code of a .hlsl source file.
trans-unit.target: 在包含 .hlsl 源文件的目标代码的头文件中设置变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: Set output files path prefix for the Ninja generator.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Ninja 生成器的输出文件路径前缀。

trans-unit.source: Set output files path prefix for the Ninja generator.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Ninja 生成器的输出文件路径前缀。

trans-unit.source: Set properties of the current directory and subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前目录和子目录的属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the WORKING_DIRECTORY test property to specify the working directory in which to execute the test. If not specified the test will be run with the current working directory set to the build directory corresponding to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 设置 WORKING_DIRECTORY 测试属性以指定要在其中执行测试的工作目录。如果未指定，将在当前工作目录设置为与当前源目录相对应的构建目录的情况下运行测试。

trans-unit.source: Set the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_CONFIGURATION variable to choose a build configuration.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_CONFIGURATION 变量以选择构建配置。

trans-unit.source: Set the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_PLATFORM_VARIABLES variable to specify variables that must be propagated into the test project. This variable is meant for use only in toolchain files and is only honored by the try_compile() command for the source files form, not when given a whole project.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_PLATFORM_VARIABLES 变量以指定必须传播到测试项目中的变量。此变量仅在工具链文件中使用，并且仅对于源文件形式由 try_compile() 命令使用，而在给出整个项目时不适用。

trans-unit.source: Set the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE variable to specify the type of target used for the source file signature.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE 变量以指定用于源文件签名的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodeexplicitFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Xcode explicitFileType 其引用源文件的属性。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodelastKnownFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 将 Xcode lastKnownFileType 属性设置为对源文件的引用。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodeexplicitFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Xcode explicitFileType 其引用源文件的属性。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodelastKnownFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 将 Xcode lastKnownFileType 属性设置为对源文件的引用。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH to where MathFunctions was installed previously and try again. Ensure that the newly created executable runs as expected.
trans-unit.target: 将 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 设置为先前安装MathFunctions的位置，然后重试。确保新创建的可执行文件按预期运行。

trans-unit.source: Set the MKLROOT environment variable to a directory that contains an MKL installation, or add the directory to the dynamic library loader environment variable for your platform (LIB, DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH or LD_LIBRARY_PATH).
trans-unit.target: 将 MKLROOT 环境变量设置为包含MKL安装的目录，或将目录添加到平台的动态库加载器环境变量（ LIB ， DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH 或 LD_LIBRARY_PATH ）。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android MIN API version (e.g. 9). The version number must be a positive decimal integer. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_API_MIN variable if it is set when a target is created. Native code builds using this API version.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android MIN API版本（例如 9 ）。版本号必须为正的十进制整数。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_ANDROID_API_MIN 变量的值初始化。使用此API版本构建本机代码。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android assets directories to copy into the main assets folder before build. This a string property that contains the directory paths separated by semicolon. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_ASSETS_DIRECTORIES variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android资产目录以在构建之前将其复制到主资产文件夹中。此字符串属性，包含用分号分隔的目录路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_ANDROID_ASSETS_DIRECTORIES 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that defines the Java source code root directories. This a string property that contains the directory paths separated by semicolon. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_JAVA_SOURCE_DIR variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置定义Java源代码根目录的Android属性。此字符串属性，包含用分号分隔的目录路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_JAVA_SOURCE_DIR 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that defines the maximum number of a parallel Android NDK compiler processes (e.g. 4). This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_PROCESS_MAX variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android属性，该属性定义并行Android NDK编译器进程的最大数量（例如 4 ）。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_PROCESS_MAX 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that defines whether or not to skip the Ant build step. This is a boolean property initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_SKIP_ANT_STEP variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android属性，该属性定义是否跳过Ant构建步骤。如果是在创建目标时设置的，则此属性是由 CMAKE_ANDROID_SKIP_ANT_STEP 变量的值初始化的布尔属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies JAR dependencies. This is a string value property. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_JAR_DEPENDENCIES variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于指定JAR依赖项的Android属性。这是一个字符串值属性。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性将由 CMAKE_ANDROID_JAR_DEPENDENCIES 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies directories to search for the .so libraries.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于指定目录以搜索 .so 库的Android属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies directories to search for the JAR libraries.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android属性,指定搜索JAR库的目录。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies the .so dependencies. This is a string property.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定.so依赖关系的Android属性。这是一个字符串属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies the location of the ProGuard config file. Leave empty to use the default one. This a string property that contains the path to ProGuard config file. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_PROGUARD_CONFIG_PATH variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于指定ProGuard配置文件位置的Android属性。保留空白以使用默认值。此字符串属性，包含ProGuard配置文件的路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_PROGUARD_CONFIG_PATH 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that states the location of the secure properties file. This is a string property that contains the file path. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_SECURE_PROPS_PATH variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置指出安全属性文件位置的Android属性。这是一个字符串属性，包含文件路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_SECURE_PROPS_PATH 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Manifest Tool -> Input and Output -> DPI Awareness in the Visual Studio target project properties.
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio目标项目属性中设置清单工具->输入和输出-> DPI意识。

trans-unit.source: Set the RULE_LAUNCH_* global properties when CTEST_USE_LAUNCHERS is on.
trans-unit.target: 当CTEST_USE_LAUNCHERS开启时,设置RULE_LAUNCH_*全局属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Visual Studio shader type of a .hlsl source file.
trans-unit.target: 设置 .hlsl 源文件的Visual Studio着色器类型。

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project AdditionalFiles in DeploymentTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. Specify additional files that will be copied to the device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 9 2008 生成器生成的 .vcproj 文件中的 DeploymentTool 中设置WinCE项目 AdditionalFiles 。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。指定将复制到设备的其他文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project AdditionalFiles in DeploymentTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. Specify additional files that will be copied to the device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在 DeploymentTool 中的 Visual Studio 9 2008 生成器生成的 .vcproj 文件中设置WinCE项目 AdditionalFiles 。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。指定将复制到设备的其他文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project RemoteDirectory in DeploymentTool and RemoteExecutable in DebuggerTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 设置在WinCE项目 RemoteDirectory 中 DeploymentTool 和 RemoteExecutable 在 DebuggerTool 中 .vcproj 由生成的文件 Visual Studio 9 2008 发电机。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project RemoteDirectory in DeploymentTool and RemoteExecutable in DebuggerTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 设置在WinCE项目 RemoteDirectory 中 DeploymentTool 和 RemoteExecutable 在 DebuggerTool 中 .vcproj 由生成的文件 Visual Studio 9 2008 发电机。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the Xcode explicitFileType attribute on its reference to a target. CMake computes a default based on target type but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置Xcode的 explicitFileType 其参考对象属性。CMake根据目标类型计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the Xcode productType attribute on its reference to a target. CMake computes a default based on target type but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 将Xcode productType 属性设置为其对目标的引用。CMake根据目标类型计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the additional options for Android Ant build system. This is a string value containing all command line options for the Ant build. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_ANT_ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android Ant构建系统的其他选项。这是一个字符串值，其中包含Ant构建的所有命令行选项。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_ANDROID_ANT_ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: Set the binary directory. If not specified, the value of CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 设置二进制目录。如果未指定，则使用 CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY 的值。

trans-unit.source: Set the dashboard model. Must be one of Experimental, Continuous, or Nightly. This parameter is required unless APPEND is specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置仪表板模型。必须是“ Experimental ，“ Continuous ”或“ Nightly 。除非指定 APPEND ,否则此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Set the default test timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认的测试超时。

trans-unit.source: Set the folder name. Use to organize targets in an IDE.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件夹名称。用来组织IDE中的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set the given variable absvar to the absolute path contained within the variable var. This is to allow the computation of an absolute path, accounting for all the special cases documented above. While this macro is used to compute the various CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_<dir> variables, it is exposed publicly to allow users who create additional path variables to also compute absolute paths where necessary, using the same logic.
trans-unit.target: 将给定变量 absvar 设置为变量 var 中包含的绝对路径。考虑到上面记录的所有特殊情况，这是为了允许计算绝对路径。虽然此宏用于计算各种 CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_<dir> 变量，但它是公开公开的，以允许创建其他路径变量的用户也可以使用相同的逻辑在必要时计算绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Set the given variable to the name of the computer.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的变量设置为计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: Set the interactive mode to 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: 将交互模式设置为 0 或 1 。

trans-unit.source: Set the log level.
trans-unit.target: 设置日志级别。

trans-unit.source: Set the max width for a test name to output.
trans-unit.target: 设置要输出的测试名称的最大宽度。

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum width for each test name to show in the output. This allows the user to widen the output to avoid clipping the test name which can be very annoying.
trans-unit.target: 设置每个测试名称在输出中显示的最大宽度。这允许用户扩大输出,以避免剪切测试名称,这可能是非常恼人的。

trans-unit.source: Set the name of the project.
trans-unit.target: 设置项目的名称。

trans-unit.source: Set the permissions for the <files>... and <directories>... specified. Valid permissions are OWNER_READ, OWNER_WRITE, OWNER_EXECUTE, GROUP_READ, GROUP_WRITE, GROUP_EXECUTE, WORLD_READ, WORLD_WRITE, WORLD_EXECUTE.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的 <files>... 和 <directories>... 的权限。有效权限是 OWNER_READ ， OWNER_WRITE ， OWNER_EXECUTE ， GROUP_READ ， GROUP_WRITE ， GROUP_EXECUTE ， WORLD_READ ， WORLD_WRITE ， WORLD_EXECUTE 。

trans-unit.source: Set the regular expression used for dependency checking.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于依赖性检查的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Set the respective value. This will result in an error for generators that do not support the respective field.
trans-unit.target: 设置相应的值。对于不支持相关字段的生成器,这将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Set the source directory. If not specified, the value of CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 设置源目录。如果未指定，则使用 CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY 的值。

trans-unit.source: Set this directory property to a true value on a subdirectory to exclude its targets from the “all” target of its ancestors. If excluded, running e.g. make in the parent directory will not build targets the subdirectory by default. This does not affect the “all” target of the subdirectory itself. Running e.g. make inside the subdirectory will still build its targets.
trans-unit.target: 在子目录上将此目录属性设置为true值，以将其目标从其祖先的“所有”目标中排除。如果排除，则默认情况下在父目录中运行例如 make 不会构建目标子目录。这不会影响子目录本身的“所有”目标。在子目录中运行例如 make 仍将建立其目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to a list of files that will be encoded and submitted to the dashboard as an addition to the test result.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为将被编码并作为测试结果的补充提交到仪表板的文件列表。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to true for an imported shared library file that has no soname field. CMake may adjust generated link commands for some platforms to prevent the linker from using the path to the library in place of its missing soname. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 对于没有 soname 字段的导入的共享库文件，将此属性设置为true 。CMake可能会为某些平台调整生成的链接命令，以防止链接器使用库路径代替丢失的 soname 。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to true to tell CMake generators not to add file-level dependencies on the shared library files linked by this target. Modification to the shared libraries will not be sufficient to re-link this target. Logical target-level dependencies will not be affected so the linked shared libraries will still be brought up to date before this target is built.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为true,告诉CMake生成器不要在此目标链接的共享库文件上添加文件级依赖。对共享库的修改将不足以重新链接这个目标。逻辑上的目标级依赖不会受到影响,所以链接的共享库仍然会在这个目标被构建之前被更新。

trans-unit.source: Set this target property to a true (or false) value to exclude (or include) the target from the “all” target of the containing directory and its ancestors. If excluded, running e.g. make in the containing directory or its ancestors will not build the target by default.
trans-unit.target: 将此目标属性设置为true（或false）值，以将目标从包含目录及其祖先的“所有”目标中排除（或包括）。如果排除，则默认情况下在包含目录或其祖先中运行例如 make 不会构建目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude depender graphs foo.dot.<target>.dependers.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为FALSE以排除依赖图 foo.dot.<target>.dependers 。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude executables from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude external libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除外部库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude module libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除模块库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude per target graphs foo.dot.<target>.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为FALSE可排除每个目标图 foo.dot.<target> 。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude shared libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为FALSE,以从生成的图形中排除共享库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude static libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除静态库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to a semicolon-separated list of command-line arguments to pass to ctest(1) when running tests through the test (or RUN_TESTS) target of the generated build system.
trans-unit.target: 通过生成的构建系统的 test （或 RUN_TESTS ）目标运行测试时， ctest(1) 设置为以分号分隔的命令行参数列表，以传递给ctest（1）。

trans-unit.source: Set this to a list of tests that must finish before this test is run. The results of those tests are not considered, the dependency relationship is purely for order of execution (i.e. it is really just a run after relationship). Consider using test fixtures with setup tests if a dependency with successful completion is required (see FIXTURES_REQUIRED).
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为必须运行的测试列表。不考虑这些测试的结果，依赖关系纯粹是按执行顺序进行的（即，它实际上只是一个追尾关系）。如果需要成功完成依赖项，请考虑将测试装置与设置测试一起使用（请参阅 FIXTURES_REQUIRED ）。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the soname embedded in an imported shared library. This is meaningful only on platforms supporting the feature. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为嵌入在导入的共享库中的 soname 。这仅在支持该功能的平台上有意义。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of configuration names available for an IMPORTED target. The names correspond to configurations defined in the project from which the target is imported. If the importing project uses a different set of configurations the names may be mapped using the MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_<CONFIG> property. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为可用于IMPORTED目标的配置名称列表。名称与导入目标的项目中定义的配置相对应。如果导入项目使用不同的配置集，则可以使用MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_ <CONFIG>属性来映射名称。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of configurations of an imported target that may be used for the current project’s <CONFIG> configuration. Targets imported from another project may not provide the same set of configuration names available in the current project. Setting this property tells CMake what imported configurations are suitable for use when building the <CONFIG> configuration. The first configuration in the list found to be provided by the imported target (i.e. via IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> for the mapped-to <CONFIG>) is selected. As a special case, an empty list element refers to the configuration-less imported target location (i.e. IMPORTED_LOCATION).
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为可用于当前项目的 <CONFIG> 配置的导入目标的配置列表。从另一个项目导入的目标可能不提供当前项目中可用的同一套配置名称。设置此属性将告诉CMake在构建 <CONFIG> 配置时适合使用哪些导入的配置。选择列表中发现的第一个配置，该配置将由导入的目标提供（即，通过 IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> 映射到 <CONFIG> ）。作为一种特殊情况，空列表元素是指无需配置的导入目标位置（即 IMPORTED_LOCATION ）。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of languages of source files compiled to produce a STATIC IMPORTED library (such as C or CXX). CMake accounts for these languages when computing how to link a target to the imported library. For example, when a C executable links to an imported C++ static library CMake chooses the C++ linker to satisfy language runtime dependencies of the static library.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为已编译以生成 STATIC IMPORTED 库的源文件的语言列表（例如 C 或 CXX ）。 CMake在计算如何将目标链接到导入的库时会考虑这些语言。例如，当C可执行文件链接到导入的C ++静态库时，CMake选择C ++链接程序以满足静态库的语言运行时依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of libraries whose interface is included when an IMPORTED library target is linked to another target. The libraries will be included on the link line for the target. Unlike the LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES property, this property applies to all imported target types, including STATIC libraries. This property is ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为将 IMPORTED 库目标链接到另一个目标时包含其接口的库列表。这些库将包含在目标的链接行中。与 LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES 属性不同，此属性适用于所有导入的目标类型，包括 STATIC 库。对于未导入的目标，将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the location of an IMPORTED target file on disk. For executables this is the location of the executable file. For bundles on macOS this is the location of the executable file inside Contents/MacOS under the application bundle folder. For STATIC libraries and modules this is the location of the library or module. For SHARED libraries on non-DLL platforms this is the location of the shared library. For frameworks on macOS this is the location of the library file symlink just inside the framework folder. For DLLs this is the location of the .dll part of the library. For UNKNOWN libraries this is the location of the file to be linked. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为磁盘上已 IMPORTED 目标文件的位置。对于可执行文件，这是可执行文件的位置。对于macOS上的捆绑软件，这是可执行文件在 Contents/MacOS 内部应用程序捆绑文件夹下的位置。对于 STATIC 库和模块，这是库或模块的位置。对于非DLL平台上的 SHARED 库，这是共享库的位置。对于macOS上的框架，这是库文件symlink的位置，位于框架文件夹内。对于DLL，这是该库 .dll 部分的位置。对于 UNKNOWN 库，这是要链接的文件的位置。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the location of the .lib part of a Windows DLL, or on AIX set it to an import file created for executables that export symbols (see the ENABLE_EXPORTS target property). Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为Windows DLL的 .lib 部分的位置，或在AIX上将其设置为为导出符号的可执行文件创建的导入文件（请参阅 ENABLE_EXPORTS 目标属性）。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the location of the .lib part of a Windows DLL. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为Windows DLL 的 .lib 部分的位置。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this variable to change the build type if you are using a multi-config generator. For example, to install with the Debug configuration, run cmake -DBUILD_TYPE=Debug -P cmake_install.cmake.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是多配置生成器，请设置此变量以更改构建类型。例如，要使用 Debug 配置安装，请运行 cmake -DBUILD_TYPE=Debug -P cmake_install.cmake 。

trans-unit.source: Set this variable to install only a single CPack component as opposed to all of them. For example, if you only want to install the Development component, run cmake -DCOMPONENT=Development -P cmake_install.cmake.
trans-unit.target: 设置此变量以仅安装单个CPack组件，而不是所有组件。例如，如果只想安装 Development 组件，请运行 cmake -DCOMPONENT=Development -P cmake_install.cmake 。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 or undefined: Legacy behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: 设置为1或未定义。应用遗留行为。

trans-unit.source: Set to 2: A new strategy is applied regarding support files: the output directory of support files is erased before SWIG interface compilation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为2：对支持文件应用新策略：在编译 SWIG 接口之前，将删除支持文件的输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Set to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR by this module. Note that if the project provides its own value for this and it is a relative path, it will be converted to an absolute path relative to the current binary directory. This is necessary because doxygen will normally be run from a directory within the source tree so that relative source paths work as expected. If this directory does not exist, it will be recursively created prior to executing the doxygen commands.
trans-unit.target: 通过此模块设置为 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 。请注意，如果项目为此提供了自己的值并且它是相对路径，则它将转换为相对于当前二进制目录的绝对路径。这是必需的，因为doxygen通常将从源树中的目录运行，以便相对的源路径按预期工作。如果该目录不存在，将在执行doxygen命令之前以递归方式创建它。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 when the target system (CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME) is Android.
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统（ CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME ）为 Android 时设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 when the target system (CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME) is iOS.
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统（ CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME ）为 iOS 时设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Set to Android. Must be specified to enable cross compiling for Android.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 Android 。必须指定以启用Android的交叉编译。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE: flags not to produce a position independent executable are passed to the linker step. For example -no-pie for GCC.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 FALSE ：不生成与位置无关的可执行文件的标志将传递到链接器步骤。例如 -no-pie 的 GCC 。

trans-unit.source: Set to FIXED or FREE to indicate the Fortran source layout.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 FIXED 或 FREE 表示Fortran源布局。

trans-unit.source: Set to NO by this module.
trans-unit.target: 通过该模块设置为“ NO 。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to tell find_package() calls to resolve symbolic links in the value of <PackageName>_DIR.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 TRUE 告诉 find_package() 调用解析 <PackageName>_DIR 值中的符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE: flags to produce a position independent executable are passed to the linker step. For example -pie for GCC.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 TRUE ：将生成位置独立可执行文件的标志传递到链接器步骤。例如， -pie 用于 GCC 。

trans-unit.source: Set to True when the target system is UNIX or UNIX-like (e.g. APPLE and CYGWIN). The CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable should be queried if a more specific understanding of the target system is required.
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统是UNIX或类似UNIX（例如 APPLE 和 CYGWIN ）时，设置为 True 。所述 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 如果需要一个更具体的理解目标系统的变量应被查询。

trans-unit.source: Set to True when the target system is Windows, including Win64.
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统是Windows（包括Win64）时，设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: Set to True when the target system is an Apple platform (macOS, iOS, tvOS or watchOS).
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统是Apple平台（macOS，iOS，tvOS或watchOS）时，设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: Set to YES by this module (note that this requires a dot version newer than 1.8.10). This option is only meaningful if DOXYGEN_HAVE_DOT is also set to YES.
trans-unit.target: 调成 YES 由该模块（注意，这需要一个 dot 版本比1.8.10更新）。仅当 DOXYGEN_HAVE_DOT 也设置为 YES 时,此选项才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Set to YES by this module.
trans-unit.target: 通过此模块设置为 YES 。

trans-unit.source: Set to YES if NO_PIE is supported by the linker and NO otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 调成 YES 如果链接器支持 NO_PIE ,则 YES，否则 NO 。

trans-unit.source: Set to YES if PIE is supported by the linker and NO otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 调成 YES 如果链接器支持 PIE ,则 YES，否则 NO 。

trans-unit.source: Set to YES if the dot component was requested and it was found, NO otherwise. Any existing value of DOXYGEN_HAVE_DOT is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 YES 如果 dot 请求并找到点组件，则 NO 。任何现有的 DOXYGEN_HAVE_DOT 值都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Set to false on Cygwin.
trans-unit.target: 在Cygwin上设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the compiler is some version of Microsoft Visual C++ or another compiler simulating Visual C++. Any compiler defining _MSC_VER is considered simulating Visual C++.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当编译器是Microsoft Visual C ++的某个版本或模拟Visual C ++的另一个编译器时， true。任何定义 _MSC_VER 的编译器都被视为模拟Visual C ++。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the compiler is some version of MinGW.
trans-unit.target: 当编译器是MinGW的某个版本时，设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the compiler is version 6.0 of Microsoft Visual C++.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当编译器是Microsoft Visual C ++ 6.0版时， true。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the compiler is version 7.0 of Microsoft Visual C++.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当编译器是Microsoft Visual C ++ 7.0版时， true。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the compiler is version 7.1 of Microsoft Visual C++.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当编译器是Microsoft Visual C ++ 7.1版时， true。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the host system is Apple macOS.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当主机系统是Apple macOS时 true。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the host system is Oracle Solaris.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当主机系统是Oracle Solaris时 true。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the host system is UNIX or UNIX like (i.e. APPLE and CYGWIN).
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当主机系统是UNIX或类似UNIX（即APPLE和CYGWIN）时， true。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when the target platform is the Microsoft Visual C++ IDE, as opposed to the command line compiler.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 当目标平台是Microsoft Visual C ++ IDE而不是命令行编译器时， true。

trans-unit.source: Set to true when using Cygwin.
trans-unit.target: 调成 true 使用Cygwin时 true。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude executables from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude external libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除外部库。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude interface libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除接口库。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude module libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除模块库。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude object libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除对象库。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude shared libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除共享库。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude static libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除静态库。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to exclude unknown libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除未知库。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to not generate depender graphs foo.dot.<target>.dependers.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE不会生成依赖图 foo.dot.<target>.dependers 。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE to not generate per-target graphs foo.dot.<target>.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE不会生成每个目标的图形 foo.dot.<target> 。

trans-unit.source: Set to ON to force the use of the static libraries. Default is OFF.
trans-unit.target: 设置为ON,强制使用静态库。默认为OFF。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to disable warnings about required library files that do not exist. (For example, Visual Studio Express editions may not provide the redistributable files.)
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "TRUE "可禁用关于不存在的所需库文件的警告。例如,Visual Studio Express版本可能不提供可重新分发的文件)。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to include custom targets in the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "true",在生成的图形中包含自定义目标。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to install only the debug runtime libraries with MSVC tools even if the release runtime libraries are also available.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "TRUE",即使发布版运行时库也可以只安装MSVC工具的调试运行时库。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to install the MSVC MFC runtime libraries.
trans-unit.target: 设置为TRUE,安装MSVC MFC运行时库。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to install the MSVC OpenMP runtime libraries
trans-unit.target: 设置为TRUE,安装MSVC OpenMP运行时库。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to install the Windows Universal CRT libraries for app-local deployment (e.g. to Windows XP). This is meaningful only with MSVC from Visual Studio 2015 or higher.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "TRUE",以安装Windows通用CRT库,用于应用程序本地部署(例如,到Windows XP)。这只对Visual Studio 2015或更高版本的MSVC有意义。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to install the debug runtime libraries when available with MSVC tools.
trans-unit.target: 设置为TRUE,当MSVC工具可用时,安装调试运行库。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE to skip calling the install(PROGRAMS) command to allow the includer to specify its own install rule, using the value of CMAKE_INSTALL_SYSTEM_RUNTIME_LIBS to get the list of libraries.
trans-unit.target: 设置为TRUE可跳过对 install(PROGRAMS) 命令的调用，以允许includer使用以下选项指定自己的安装规则： CMAKE_INSTALL_SYSTEM_RUNTIME_LIBS 以获取库列表。

trans-unit.source: Set to a true value to ask CTest to launch the test process with CPU affinity for a fixed set of processors. If enabled and supported for the current platform, CTest will choose a set of processors to place in the CPU affinity mask when launching the test process. The number of processors in the set is determined by the PROCESSORS test property or the number of processors available to CTest, whichever is smaller. The set of processors chosen will be disjoint from the processors assigned to other concurrently running tests that also have the PROCESSOR_AFFINITY property enabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置为真值，以要求CTest以一组固定的处理器的CPU亲和性启动测试过程。如果为当前平台启用并受支持，则CTest将在启动测试过程时选择一组处理器放置在CPU亲和力掩码中。集合中的 PROCESSORS 数由PROCESSORS测试属性或CTest可用的处理器数确定，以较小者为准。所选的处理器集将与分配给其他同时运行的测试的处理器脱节，这些测试也具有 PROCESSOR_AFFINITY 启用 PROCESSOR_AFFINITY属性）。

trans-unit.source: Set to a true value to use the deprecated per-api-level headers instead of the unified headers. If not specified, the default will be false unless using a NDK that does not provide unified headers.
trans-unit.target: 设置为true,以使用废弃的per-api级头文件,而不是统一的头文件。如果没有指定,默认值为false,除非使用的NDK不提供统一的头文件。

trans-unit.source: Set to a true value when using a Microsoft Visual Studio cl compiler that targets a 64-bit architecture.
trans-unit.target: 当使用针对 64位体系结构的Microsoft Visual Studio cl 编译器时，将其设置为true 。

trans-unit.source: Set to false, or undefined, if we haven’t found, or don’t want to use Xxx.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们没有找到，或者不想使用Xxx，请设置为false或未定义。

trans-unit.source: Set to list of currently enabled languages.
trans-unit.target: 设置为当前启用的语言列表。

trans-unit.source: Set to specify how many process slots this test requires. If not set, the default is 1 processor.
trans-unit.target: 设置以指定此测试需要多少个处理插槽。如果未设置，则默认值为 1 个处理器。

trans-unit.source: Set to specify which C++ standard library to use. If not specified, a default will be selected as described in the variable documentation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为指定要使用的C++标准库。如果没有指定,将按照变量文档中的描述选择一个默认值。
